translations.text: The Inevitable Hour!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Alhaqqa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: What is the Inevitable Hour?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ma alhaqqa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: And what will make you realize what the Inevitable Hour is?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wama adraka ma alhaqqa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: ˹Both˺ Thamûd and ’Ȃd denied the Striking Disaster.<sup foot_note=77541>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Kaththabat thamoodu waAAadun bilqariAAa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: As for Thamûd, they were destroyed by an overwhelming blast.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Faamma thamoodu faohlikoo bittaghiya
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَمَّا عَادٌ فَأُهْلِكُوا۟ بِرِيحٍ صَرْصَرٍ عَاتِيَةٍ

translations.text: And as for ’Ȃd, they were destroyed by a furious, bitter wind
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waamma AAadun faohlikoo bireehinsarsarin AAatiya
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: سَخَّرَهَا عَلَيْهِمْ سَبْعَ لَيَالٍ وَثَمَـٰنِيَةَ أَيَّامٍ حُسُومًا فَتَرَى ٱلْقَوْمَ فِيهَا صَرْعَىٰ كَأَنَّهُمْ أَعْجَازُ نَخْلٍ خَاوِيَةٍ

translations.text: which Allah unleashed on them non-stop for seven nights and eight days, so that you would have seen its people lying dead like trunks of uprooted palm trees.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Sakhkharaha AAalayhim sabAAa layalinwathamaniyata ayyamin husooman fataraalqawma feeha sarAAa kaannahum aAAjazunakhlin khawiya
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Do you see any of them left alive?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fahal tara lahum min baqiya
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَجَآءَ فِرْعَوْنُ وَمَن قَبْلَهُۥ وَٱلْمُؤْتَفِكَـٰتُ بِٱلْخَاطِئَةِ

translations.text: Also, Pharaoh and those before him, and ˹the people of˺ the overturned cities ˹of Lot˺ indulged in sin,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wajaa firAAawnu waman qablahu walmu/tafikatubilkhati-a
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَعَصَوْا۟ رَسُولَ رَبِّهِمْ فَأَخَذَهُمْ أَخْذَةً رَّابِيَةً

translations.text: each disobeying their Lord’s messenger, so He seized them with a crushing grip.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: FaAAasaw rasoola rabbihim faakhathahumakhthatan rabiya
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّا لَمَّا طَغَا ٱلْمَآءُ حَمَلْنَـٰكُمْ فِى ٱلْجَارِيَةِ

translations.text: Indeed, when the floodwater had overflowed, We carried you<sup foot_note=77542>1</sup> in the floating Ark ˹with Noah˺,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna lamma taghaalmao hamalnakum fee aljariya
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: لِنَجْعَلَهَا لَكُمْ تَذْكِرَةً وَتَعِيَهَآ أُذُنٌ وَٰعِيَةٌ

translation.text: and would be conscious of it

translations.text: so that We may make this a reminder to you, and that attentive ears may grasp it.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: LinajAAalaha lakum tathkiratanwataAAiyaha othunun waAAiya
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَإِذَا نُفِخَ فِى ٱلصُّورِ نَفْخَةٌ وَٰحِدَةٌ

translations.text: At last, when the Trumpet will be blown with one blast,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fa-itha nufikha fee assoorinafkhatun wahida
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَحُمِلَتِ ٱلْأَرْضُ وَٱلْجِبَالُ فَدُكَّتَا دَكَّةً وَٰحِدَةً

translations.text: and the earth and mountains will be lifted up and crushed with one blow,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wahumilati al-ardu waljibalufadukkata dakkatan wahida
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: on that Day the Inevitable Event will have come to pass.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fayawma-ithin waqaAAati alwaqiAAa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: The sky will then be so torn that it will be frail,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wanshaqqati assamaofahiya yawma-ithin wahiya
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱلْمَلَكُ عَلَىٰٓ أَرْجَآئِهَا ۚ وَيَحْمِلُ عَرْشَ رَبِّكَ فَوْقَهُمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ ثَمَـٰنِيَةٌ

translations.text: with the angels on its sides. On that Day eight ˹mighty angels˺ will bear the Throne of your Lord above them.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walmalaku AAala arja-ihawayahmilu AAarsha rabbika fawqahum yawma-ithin thamaniya
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: يَوْمَئِذٍ تُعْرَضُونَ لَا تَخْفَىٰ مِنكُمْ خَافِيَةٌ

translations.text: You will then be presented ˹before Him for judgment˺, and none of your secrets will stay hidden.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Yawma-ithin tuAAradoona latakhfa minkum khafiya
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَأَمَّا مَنْ أُوتِىَ كِتَـٰبَهُۥ بِيَمِينِهِۦ فَيَقُولُ هَآؤُمُ ٱقْرَءُوا۟ كِتَـٰبِيَهْ

translations.text: As for those given their records in their right hand, they will cry ˹happily˺, “Here ˹everyone˺! Read my record!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Faamma man ootiya kitabahubiyameenihi fayaqoolu haomu iqraoo kitabiyah
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: I surely knew I would face my reckoning.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Innee thanantu annee mulaqinhisabiyah
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: They will be in a life of bliss,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fahuwa fee AAeeshatin radiya
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: in an elevated Garden,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fee jannatin AAaliya
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: whose fruit will hang within reach.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qutoofuha daniya
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: كُلُوا۟ وَٱشْرَبُوا۟ هَنِيٓـًٔۢا بِمَآ أَسْلَفْتُمْ فِى ٱلْأَيَّامِ ٱلْخَالِيَةِ

translations.text: ˹They will be told,˺ “Eat and drink joyfully for what you did in the days gone by.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Kuloo washraboo hanee-an bimaaslaftum fee al-ayyami alkhaliya
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَمَّا مَنْ أُوتِىَ كِتَـٰبَهُۥ بِشِمَالِهِۦ فَيَقُولُ يَـٰلَيْتَنِى لَمْ أُوتَ كِتَـٰبِيَهْ

translations.text: And as for those given their record in their left hand, they will cry ˹bitterly˺, “I wish I had not been given my record,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waamma man ootiya kitabahubishimalihi fayaqoolu ya laytanee lam oota kitabiyah
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: nor known anything of my reckoning!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walam adri ma hisabiyah
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: I wish death was the end!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ya laytaha kanati alqadiya
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: My wealth has not benefited me!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ma aghna AAannee maliyah
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: My authority has been stripped from me.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Halaka AAannee sultaniyah
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: ˹It will be said,˺ “Seize and shackle them,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Khuthoohu faghullooh
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: then burn them in Hell,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Thumma aljaheema sallooh
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ثُمَّ فِى سِلْسِلَةٍ ذَرْعُهَا سَبْعُونَ ذِرَاعًا فَٱسْلُكُوهُ

translations.text: then tie them up with chains seventy arms long.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Thumma fee silsilatin tharAAuhasabAAoona thiraAAan faslukooh
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ لَا يُؤْمِنُ بِٱللَّهِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ

translations.text: For they never had faith in Allah, the Greatest,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Innahu kana la yu/minu billahialAAatheem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: nor encouraged the feeding of the poor.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wala yahuddu AAalataAAami almiskeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: So this Day they will have no close friend here,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Falaysa lahu alyawma hahuna hameem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: nor any food except ˹oozing˺ pus,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wala taAAamun illamin ghisleen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: which none will eat except the evildoers.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: La ya/kuluhu illa alkhati-oon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Now, I do swear by whatever you see,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fala oqsimu bima tubsiroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: and whatever you cannot see!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wama la tubsiroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Indeed, this ˹Quran˺ is the recitation of a noble Messenger.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Innahu laqawlu rasoolin kareem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَا هُوَ بِقَوْلِ شَاعِرٍ ۚ قَلِيلًا مَّا تُؤْمِنُونَ

translations.text: It is not the prose of a poet ˹as you claim˺, ˹yet˺ you hardly have any faith.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wama huwa biqawli shaAAirinqaleelan ma tu/minoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَا بِقَوْلِ كَاهِنٍ ۚ قَلِيلًا مَّا تَذَكَّرُونَ

translations.text: Nor is it the mumbling of a fortune-teller, ˹yet˺ you are hardly mindful.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wala biqawli kahinin qaleelanma tathakkaroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: ˹It is˺ a revelation from the Lord of all worlds.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Tanzeelun min rabbi alAAalameen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Had the Messenger made up something in Our Name,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walaw taqawwala AAalayna baAAdaal-aqaweel
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: We would have certainly seized him by his right hand,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Laakhathna minhu bilyameen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: then severed his aorta,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Thumma laqataAAna minhualwateen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَمَا مِنكُم مِّنْ أَحَدٍ عَنْهُ حَـٰجِزِينَ

translations.text: and none of you could have shielded him ˹from Us˺!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fama minkum min ahadin AAanhu hajizeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Indeed, this ˹Quran˺ is a reminder to those mindful ˹of Allah˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-innahu latathkiratun lilmuttaqeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: And We certainly know that some of you will persist in denial,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-inna lanaAAlamu anna minkum mukaththibeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: and it will surely be a source of regret for the disbelievers.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-innahu lahasratun AAala alkafireen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: And indeed, this ˹Quran˺ is the absolute truth.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-innahu lahaqqu alyaqeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: So glorify the Name of your Lord, the Greatest.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fasabbih bismi rabbika alAAatheem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration
